p: The statistical analysis was conducted by ANOVA followed by Duncan’s test using SAS software [ 23]. The cage was the experimental unit for each parameter. The significance effects were declared at P < 0.05. Orthogonal polynomial contrasts were also utilized for determining the linear and quadratic effects of levels of TEO inclusion considering only negative control (0 mg/kg TEO) as a control, whereas positive control was not included in this analysis. Significance was declared at P ≤ 0.05.
